mapper.update:
update T_PRODUCT_TRANSFER
CONTRACT_ID = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION_ID = #{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_NANE = #{productNane,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSFER_CUST_ID = #{transferCustId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSFER_CUST_NAME = #{transferCustName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSFER_AMT = #{transferAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRANSFEREE_PURCHASE_ID = #{transfereePurchaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSFEREE_CUST_ID = #{transfereeCustId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSFEREE_CUST_NAME = #{transfereeCustName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
REMAIN_TERMS = #{remainTerms,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
POSITION_EARNING = #{positionEarning,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXPECT_EARNING = #{expectEarning,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRANSFER_TIME = #{transferTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SETTLE_TIME = #{settleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_PRODUCT_TRANSFER set CONTRACT_ID = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION_ID = #{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_NANE = #{productNane,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSFER_CUST_ID = #{transferCustId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSFER_CUST_NAME = #{transferCustName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSFER_AMT = #{transferAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRANSFEREE_PURCHASE_ID = #{transfereePurchaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSFEREE_CUST_ID = #{transfereeCustId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSFEREE_CUST_NAME = #{transfereeCustName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMAIN_TERMS = #{remainTerms,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, POSITION_EARNING = #{positionEarning,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXPECT_EARNING = #{expectEarning,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRANSFER_TIME = #{transferTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SETTLE_TIME = #{settleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
